title: Virat Kohli

coverImage.license: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 4.0 International license.

summary: Indian international cricketer who currently captains the India national team.

value.label: Virat Kohli
Delhi, India
Chikoo
Indian
Batsman
Anuskha Sharma

image.license: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported license.

value.label: Kohli is a naturally aggressive batsman with strong technical skills. He usually bats in the middle-order, but, on many occasions, has opened the innings as well. He bats with a slightly open-chested stance and a strong bottom-hand grip,  and is said to have quick footwork. He is known for his wide range of shots, ability to pace an innings and batting under pressure.

image.altText: Style of play for Virat Kohli
image.license: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 4.0 International license.

value.label: Kohli made his first-class debut for Delhi against Tamil Nadu in 2006, at the age of 18
Kohli was included in the Indian ODI squad for 2008 tour of Sri Lanka and the Champions Trophy in Pakistan

The Sri Lanka national cricket team, nicknamed The Lions, represents Sri Lanka in international cricket. It is a full member of the International Cricket Council (ICC) with Test, One-Day International (ODI) and T20 International (T20I) status.

value.label: Kohli captained the victorious Indian team at the 2008 ICC Under-19 Cricket World Cup held in Malaysia
Kohli played in every match of India's successful World Cup campaign in 2011
In June 2013, Kohli featured in the ICC Champions Trophy in England which India won

The ICC Champions Trophy was a one day international (ODI) cricket tournament organised by the International Cricket Council (ICC), second in importance only to the Cricket World Cup. Its name was changed to the Champions Trophy in 2002.

value.label: For 2014 ICC World Twenty20 and Kohli was named vice-captain.

The ICC T20 World Cup (earlier known as ICC World Twenty20) is the international championship of Twenty20 International cricket. The tournament currently consists of 16 teams, comprising the top eight teams from the rankings at the given deadline and four other teams chosen through the T20 World Cup Qualifier.

value.label: In March 2008, Kohli was bought on a youth contract by Royal Challengers Bangalore for $30,000.
The Royal Challengers Bangalore are a franchise cricket team based in Bangalore, Karnataka, that plays in the Indian Premier League (IPL)

value.label: In 2017, became the fastest in the world to reach 15,000 international runs.

value.label: In2018, became the first batsman to score 500 runs in a bilateral ODI series.

image.altText: In2018, became the first batsman to score 500 runs in a bilateral ODI series.

value.label: The India national cricket team is also known as Team India and Men in Blue. India is ranked first in Tests, second in ODIs and second in T20Is by the ICC. Virat Kohli is the current captain of the team, while the head coach is Ravi Shastri.
